operations.name: Gets the list of Payroll Providers.

Allow the upload of QnA content from an Excel File.
            
The file should have the following columns "GCC", "LLC", "Intent", "Content", "Language".
The order of the columns does not matter.
            
The provided intents name should exist.

Upload pay elements for wage type categories as a CSV file.

Allows the upload of WorkInstruction content from an Excel File.
            
The file should have the following columns "GCC", "LLC", "IntentUid", "Answer", "Language".
The order of the columns does not matter.
            
The provided intents name should exist.
